title: 31: OBITCH I'd rather be cursed than broke...
description:
It’s Thursday and boy oh boy have we got a show for you today. This week Spencer teaches us how to get ready for a burial, and then Madison tells us how we can memorialize that forever with a death mask! We’ve got a range of obituaries from sweet to scientific, and of course, we’ve got, some dumb.ass.criminalsssssss.
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors: 
Apostrophe: Apostrophe.com/obit and use code ‘obit’ for $15 off your first visit! 
Stamps.com: Just go to stamps.com click the microphone at the top of the page and enter code OBIT for a special offer that includes a 4 week trial, FREE postage, and a digital scale.
Green Chef: Go to greenchef.com/obit130 and use code obit130 to get $130 dollars off plus free shipping!
Sources:  https://work.chron.com/average-pay-mortuary-makeup-artist-17793.html https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederik_Ruysch https://bartonfuneral.com/funeral-basics/history-of-embalming/ https://www.businessinsider.com/a-mortician-reveals-what-its-like-to-work-at-the-morgue-2013-2 https://www.joincake.com/blog/how-do-funeral-homes-dress-bodies/ https://www.britannica.com/topic/death-mask https://www.grunge.com/240887/the-crazy-true-history-of-death-masks/?utm_campaign=clip  https://www.biography.com/news/famous-death-masks https://www.cnn.com/style/article/death-masks/index.html https://www.medicalnewstoday.com/articles/phrenology-the-pseudoscience-of-skull-shapes http://www.theterrestrial.com/interview/nick-reynolds/ https://www.theguardian.com/uk/2013/feb/28/bruce-reynolds https://historycollection.com/unmasking-the-dead-10-eerie-and-infamous-death-masks/10/ https://www.joincake.com/blog/death-mask/ https://historycollection.com/queen-death-masks-madame-tussaud-narrowly-escaped-death-morbid-bargain/2/ https://medium.com/omgfacts/death-masks-the-heirloom-nobody-asked-for-61a6382d2b2 https://discover.hubpages.com/education/The-Bloody-History-of-Madame-Tussauds-Wax-Museums https://www.huffpost.com/entry/mark-loescher-says-hes-half-orangutan_n_1290576
See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
